attributes.action: take notice and act upon heavily subscribed to petitions and not just pay lip service
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
what a great idea, set up e,petitions to appease the Great British public and
create the impression of people power.
either act upon the people`s wishes like a REAL democrat or hold your hand up to creating, what is in truth, an ellaborate and cynical ploy to enhance your own ego.

rejection.details: Please email team at petitions pm.gov.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
